DOC.brief_summary: This is a study to evaluate immediate implants.
DOC.brief_title: Study on Immediate Placement to Evaluate Astra Tech Osseospeed Implants in an Immediate Loading Protocol in Extraction Sockets and Healed Ridges
DOC.detailed_description: Solitary replacement of teeth by implants in upper maxilla - immediate implants
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older Smoking Medical risk patients
